00038 #ifndef _musepack_requant_h
00039 #define _musepack_requant_h_
00040 
00041 #include "musepack/musepack.h"
00042 
00043 /* C O N S T A N T S */
00044 extern const mpc_uint32_t Res_bit [18];         // bits per sample for chosen quantizer
00045 extern const MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT __Cc    [1 + 18];     // coefficients for requantization
00046 extern const mpc_int32_t          __Dc    [1 + 18];     // offset for requantization
00047 
00048 #define Cc      (__Cc + 1)
00049 #define Dc      (__Dc + 1)
00050 
00051 #endif // _musepack_requant_h_
